text: Donald Trump won the 2024 presidential
election and I know that many people
will want me to solely blame kamla
Harris's campaign strategy or the
Democrats as a party but frankly you
cannot convince me that a nation of
people who cannot be convinced not to
vote for a white supremacist promising
to destroy their rights every
marginalized community and their entire
democracy is without blame that they are
not resp responsible for their choices
and the consequences that will follow I
want to make this brief because frankly
it's clear to me that I have been
wasting my breath trying to warn
Americans of the dangers of a trump
administration because Trump himself
told them what those dangers were he
didn't run on policy he didn't promise
to build anything instead he promised to
tear this nation apart to break things
down he openly promised us police
violence total police immunity not only
the deportation and abuse of
undocumented immigrants but to reverse
naturalization for immigrants who became
US citizens already he promised to ban
abortion Nationwide to dismantle the EPA
the Department of Education he promised
to ban our history to ban books to keep
the American public even dumber than
apparently more than 64 million
Americans already are because the
majority of this country's voters voted
for him understand this Donald Trump did
not just win the electoral college he
won the a popular vote and I would argue
he won it by a landslide for years I
have listened to Americans insist that
Hillary Clinton is to blame for the
losing the 2016 election to Donald Trump
that she was too unlikable that she
called Trump voters deplorables that she
didn't campaign enough in the swing
States and for years I have thought how
ridiculous a nation must be to insist it
made perfect sense to elect a white
supremacist sexist xenophobic racist
stupid ass bigot who told us exact actly
who he was because the woman he ran
against wasn't likable enough that she
didn't Campaign hard enough all the
while I have thought that if it's an
uphill battle for anyone to beat a white
supremacist they are far more qualified
than for any reason it is an indictment
on the nation but that's never what I've
said because I have always chosen to try
to be mindful about how I discuss us
elections whose results totally upend my
life and I knew not just based on that
election or the general voting patterns
of each demographic in this country or
the bigoted discourse that's been
suffocating us all for three election
Cycles now but by my lived experience as
a black woman that this deeply racist
and sexist country that refused to elect
a white woman would not elect a black
woman I knew that and I voiced that the
moment Joe Biden dropped out and kamla
Harris became the nominee but I allow
people to muscle me into believing
America isn't who I've always known it
to be and who it continues to show me it
is I listen to people tell me that I was
being too cynical to believe she would
have an impossible Hill to climb to
believe that white women would never
vote for her no matter what they told
you that this country hates black women
that it hates immigrants and that it
hates KLA Harris not for who she is but
what she is but people wanted her to win
we wanted her to win they wanted to
believe she could win they wanted to
feel optimistic which required them to
believe America was not America so they
convinced themselves KLA Harris could
win if she did XYZ if she r a particular
kind of campaign if she was more left if
she was less left if she laugh less if
she talk more the list goes on and
people were so convinced I let them sell
me a dream I knew was a mirage I let
people muscle me into forgetting the
most important truth about racism and
misogyny which is that it doesn't care
about truth it does not care about
qualifications it does not care about
Fair the truth is there is nothing kamla
Harris could have done to win that
election I knew it when she became the
nominee and I'm more sure than ever
before many left want to believe and
will continue to argue tooth and nail
that she did not win because she wasn't
left enough because she was too Centrist
because of her stance on Gaza but the
evidence simply does not reflect this
first of all maybe if only kamla Harris
lost you could choose to ignore all the
data that explicitly told us that
Americans believed KLA Harris and the
Democrats were too liberal which is
something they likely believed not
because of KLA Harris's actual stances
or policy agenda but simply because
she's a black woman but it wasn't just
KLA Harris who lost it's not even just
that the Democrats are projected to lose
the Senate and the house but Progressive
legislation on the ballot failed all
over the country from Florida to
California failed the entire country
moved to the far right some leftists
will choose to believe that the entire
country moving to the far right shooting
down Progressive legislation and
candidates Nationwide and explicitly
declaring that the Democratic candidate
was two left is proof that the candidate
lost because she didn't openly Pander to
the farle enough many of whom declared
time and time again that they wouldn't
vote for a Democrat under any
circumstances because they were going to
break the duap get the greens to 5%
teach the Democrats a lesson on Gaza
vote their conscience vote their heart
not vote at all because both parties are
the same and fascism is already here
some leftists will choose to believe
this outcome is the result of Gaza and
that this outcome proves that the
Democrats would have won had they
listened to the furthest left but the
data does not support this billstein did
not win 5% she didn't even win 2% not in
Michigan or anywhere else the exit polls
indicated what many already knew and
it's that Americans care about domestic
issues far more than they care about
foreign policy or what happens abroad
they voted on economy and their flatly
incorrect belief that Trump would be
better on the economy despite Economist
after Economist assuring us all that
Trump will destroy the economy and that
he would suppress the marginalized
groups they've grown sick of hearing
from leftists will say that Democrats
have no one to blame for the results of
this election but themselves
but that implies that it's Democrats who
lost something tonight but it's all of
us who lost we will lose our rights and
many of us will lose our lives you are
not dunking on the Dems you are dunking
on us the joke is on US America is not
who many leftists want to believe it is
the truth is that this country is deeply
deeply racist sexist homophobic
xenophobic fundamentally hateful and
downright uneducated no one will gain
anything from a trump presidency but the
losses will be crippling importantly
although I think many leftists are wrong
in what they'll choose to take from the
results of this election I want to be
explicitly and abundantly clear that
leftists far left or otherwise are not
to blame for the results of this
election shoots not even the Electoral
colleges to blame because most voters
did vote for Trump but you know who
didn't black people if there is one
solitary group in this country who is
not to blame for the dark times that are
soon to come upon us it's black people
who voted overwhelmingly for the
Democrats and to save this democracy and
despite how many thinly veiled racist
attacks black people had to endure all
election season that we were only voting
for KLA because she's black all ranging
from Republicans to White leftists and
even some non-white people like the
green parties both transphobic and
anti-abortion vice presidential pick
butwe the truth is that black people
always vote overwhelmingly Democrat even
when the candidates have been white as
they usually are because the alternative
is is a white supremacist party openly
and aggressively committed to our
subjugation so do not look to black
people to blame for what's to come look
to white men white women and Latino
voters who I wish I could say I was
surprised by but I am not because I know
what this country is while kamla
Harris's campaign people who invested
their efforts into protesting against
her because their contempt is reserved
for liberals not fascists told us that
they were protesting kamla Harris and
making demands of kamla Harris while
speaking of Donald Trump asking nothing
of Donald Trump and downplaying every
threat made by Donald Trump because they
said that they knew they could not get
anywhere with Donald Trump and they were
correct we will not get anywhere with
Donald Trump so save your demands
because he will not hear them hold off
on your protests because you will likely
be brutalized and criminalized as Donald
Trump has promised police violence make
peace with the rights that you've
already lost to Trump's Supreme Court
and kiss the remainder goodbye because
any hope at saving the Supreme Court or
any of your rights is done at least for
your lifetime whatever you thought the
Democrats didn't do enough of prepare to
lose even that much I don't have to
wonder about the nightmare to come
because Donald Trump the Republicans and
the Christian Heritage Foundation told
us exactly what they have planned and
how they're going to do it and America
overwhelmingly declared that it's what
they want and who am I to lecture
America about what's best for
them I moved through so many emotions
tonight from heart heartbreaking
disbelief to rage and finally I have
tried to land on apathy and
exhaustion I have expended all my energy
trying to convince Americans that you
should take seriously a man threatening
to upend your democracy and civil rights
especially when that same man already
served as president and did things like
incite a [ __ ] Insurrection when he
lost I have no energy to keep trying to
convince Americans that their enemy is
not the most oppressed marginalized
group in their societ
that hurting immigrants will not bring
you money power or resources of any kind
that immigrants are not the reason you
don't have those things I am tired of
trying to explain to leftist
accelerationists that you are not going
to convince the Democrats to be more
left-wing by putting the far-right nut
jobs in office that you are not going to
spite the Democratic party or the powers
that be by not electing them that you
are not going to show them [ __ ] you're
not holding them accountable you are
strapping the country and the most
marginalized people in it to the [ __ ]
rails I am tired trying to explain to
people that the world they dream of
cannot be accomplished with a single
phone call no matter what people who do
nothing but run for president every four
years tells you I am tired of trying to
explain anything to Americans who so
desperately wanted to be able to
critique KLA Harris in a vacuum that an
election is about Choice it is about
choosing someone in relation to the
other candidates could possibly make
sense to make these indictments of KLA
Harris in a vacuum meanwhile Trump is
the alternative know it's been in my
mind mind all election season repeatedly
I hear Americans complain that every
election they say this is the most
important election that democracy is in
danger every time I hear this complaint
it leaves me at a loss as I just start
firing questions at myself is something
less true because you hear it often what
does it cost you to go vote why are
people behaving as though by being asked
to vote the bare minimum they are being
asked to build the ark and load the
Animals by their lonesome by end of
business day is it absurd that democracy
and your personal freedoms would be
under threat in a nation where white
supremacists never wanted you to have
those freedoms in the first place is it
absurd that you would be told your vote
is important and that it's necessary you
exercise it in a nation where you had to
fight for the right in the first place
because the white supremacist in charge
didn't want you to have it I don't even
understand the need for this
exacerbation at the concept of being
told at election time the time where
power is up for grabs that it will yet
again important to prevent your enemies
from Gaining power someone promised that
because it was important to vote in one
election that it could not or would not
be important to vote in the next one yes
you keep being told that this is the
most important election and the
democracy is under threat because it is
how many rights do we have to lose
before we get it through our thick
skulls that our rights are always in
danger that we will have to keep showing
up and fighting for our rights and not
just by voting that's the least of it if
you can vote Republicans spend 50 years
actively working to overturn row and
they always show up to vote because they
get that it's never just the one and
done you have to fight to get rights and
you have to fight to maintain them your
ancestors did not fight for your right
to vote in one election no one told you
only one election mattered it's a right
you keep exercising and honestly you
should want to no one should have to
fight you to use what power you do have
I do not know why people keep acting
like because the last election they were
told was the most important that the
next one can't be have you ever had
problems and have those problems ever
gotten worse over time exactly have you
ever worked out and dieted so that you
could lose weight and when you lost that
weight how did you maintain it by
continuing to work out and eat right but
like I said I have gone through all the
emotions disbelief rage and finally
apathy or at least I am trying to feel
apathetic because the pain is
overwhelming I've been in America since
I was 14 years old and I am now 31 years
old that is 16 years and five elections
that I've have had no say in all have
impacted me greatly but 2016 upended my
life 2016 brought forth one of the worst
times in my life as an immigrant in this
country but as I sit here in 2024 coming
to terms with what's in store for me
again and how I avoid it I know that
America not only does not give a [ __ ]
but it's the outcome they wanted so
there's no need for me to keep bearing
my soul or trying to plead with this
nation I am going to save my breath as I
should have all election season and as I
will when Donald Trump takes hold of
this country and people start to
experience the fascism they insisted was
already here I am no longer in a
position to advocate for Americans who
Advocate against immigrants like me this
is what the majority of Americans wanted
and my heart is with those of us who
will not survive it
